Header: Bollywood’s Salman Khan, Katrina Kaif set ramp on fire with traditional touch in Mumbai
Content: Bollywood stars Salman Khan and Katrina Kaif dazzled on the ramp in glittering creations by ace Indian designer Manish Malhotra during a fashion show in the country’s entertainment capital Mumbai . The pair added grandeur to the show by showing off the designer’s couture collection. The reigning design was flower motifs and the fabric of choice was lace, the interweaving of which gave the whole collection a very romantic and summery, yet royal touch. Malhotra is renowed Indian fashion designer who has designed costumes for many Bollywood movies in the past. His clients include top Bollywood actors including superstars Salman Khan and Shah Rukh Khan.
